name: Lance Coin
description: It's time to create a truly reliable and stable cryptocurrency that will become a solid bridge between the sports and leisure industries traditional and digital. With LCE ordinary consumers will be able to make purchases online or at physical sports stores, participate in sports platforms, place bets, pay, receipts and much more. The possibilities are really endless. The LCE was developed to be used as a means of digital payment, its audience is all those who want to use in their purchase and sale transactions for physical or online businesses.
